title: Kenya: Kenya Ports Authority's Annual Business Luncheon
text:
Kenya Ports Authority's Annual Business Luncheon Tagged: 
The Kenya Ports Authority hosted its annual business luncheon forum 
in Nairobi at Kempinski Hotel in Nairobi on Wednesday afternoon. 
Among the list of 
the speakers emceed by Classic 105's Larry Asego were KPA chairman Major (Rtd) Marsden Related Topics 
Madoka and MD Gichiri Ndua. 
In attendance were the Transport 
and Infrastructure CS James Macharia who was accompanied by East Africa tourism cabinet secretary Phyllis 
Kandie, Kenya Association of Manufacturers chief executive Phylis Wakiaga and Uganda High Commissioner Angelina Wapakhabulo. Kenya 
You might want to get some popcorn for this one. It's Kenya versus the International Criminal Court (ICC), the sequel. … see more » Copyright © 2015 The Star. All rights reserved.
